page.title: 13Sport survey, 7-11 year olds
page.content:
A survey in one of the local primary schools showed that 75% of the children took part in active sport out of school. The most popular sports were swimming and football. 85% of the children made use of local sports centres and 70% made use of sports centres elsewhere in the town. Sport is mainly undertaken by the younger members of the community. How- ever the 167 households surveyed in the area showed that 53% of the sample had members of the family engaged in active sport. This suggests considerable adult participation. The area is well served with a wide variety of sports facilities, but the nearest swimming pool is in the town centre.
Survey made in Downing C.P. School.
